did.abstract: Journal kept by Mrs. Emily Parmelee Belden (Mrs. David Douglas Belden) during travels from Omaha, Nebraska to Central City, Colorado, 8-28 October, 1863. Typescript made by William B. Parmelee prior to 1931 from an earlier carbon copy. 20 p. Xerox prints prepared at NYPL through the courtesy of Mr. and Mrs. Wirth F. Ferger, Arlington, Virginia, in 1969

prefercite.p: Across the plains : [manuscript diary], Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
